name: hss
notes: An interactive parallel ssh client featuring autocomplete and asynchronous execution. Never type the annoying ssh commands again.

name: iprange
notes: A very fast command line utility for processing IP lists (merge, compare, exclude, etc).

name: mosh
notes: Remote SSH client that achieve good responsiveness in presence of intermittent connectivity and roaming.

name: pssh
notes: PSSH provides parallel versions of OpenSSH and related tools. Included are pssh, pscp, prsync, pnuke, and pslurp. The project includes psshlib which can be used within custom applications.

name: tunnelmole-client
notes: Connect to local servers from anywhere.

name: Privoxy
notes: Privoxy is a non-caching web proxy with advanced filtering capabilities for enhancing privacy, modifying web page data and HTTP headers, controlling access, and removing ads and other obnoxious Internet junk.

name: ProxyChains
notes: A tool that forces any TCP connection made by any given application to follow through proxy like TOR or any other SOCKS4, SOCKS5 or HTTP(S) proxy.

name: Shadowsocks
notes: A secure socks5 proxy, designed to protect your Internet traffic.

name: dnscrypt-proxy
notes: DNS proxy with support for encrypted DNS protocols,cross platform.

name: hflow
notes: A command-line, debugging http/s proxy server.

name: mitmproxy
notes: An interactive HTTPS proxy.

name: ngrok
notes: Reverse proxy for sharing localhost

name: TRASA
notes: : Zero trust access to Web, SSH, RDP, and Database services

name: Selenoid UI
notes: : Simple UI for the scalable golang implementation of Selenium Hub named Selenoid. We use XTerm for streaming logs over websockets from docker containers.

name: http-tanker
notes: Terminal application used for API testing; easily create, manage and execute http requests from the terminal.

name: mtr
notes: The functionality of the 'traceroute' and 'ping' programs in a single network diagnostic tool.

name: reachable
notes: Check if a domain is up.

name: siege
notes: An http load testing and benchmarking utility designed to let web developers stress their code.

name: speed-test
notes: `speedtest-net` wrapper with different UI.

name: speedtest-cli
notes: Test internet bandwidth using speedtest.net.

name: speedtest.net
notes: Test internet connection speed and ping using speedtest.net.

name: vl
notes: URL link checker on text documents

name: vnStat
notes: vnStat is a console-based network traffic monitor that uses the network interface statistics provided by the kernel as information source. This means that vnStat won't actually be sniffing any traffic and also ensures light use of system resources regardless of network traffic rate.

name: CyberGhost
notes: CyberGhost VPN allows you to surf the Internet freely, as if in disguise, regardless of the type of application you use and from where you log in.

name: IVPN
notes: IVPN offers a secure VPN service to privacy minded individuals including multi-hop technology and fast bandwidth.

name: Mozilla VPN
notes: Protect your web history, feel safer on public Wi-Fi, and limit ad tracking by increasing the security of your network connection.

name: Mullvad
notes: Mullvad is a VPN service that helps keep your online activity, identity, and location private.

name: OpenVPN
notes: VPN system that implements techniques to create secure point-to-point or site-to-site connections in routed or bridged configurations and remote access facilities

name: Private Internet Access
notes: Private Internet Access provides state of the art, multi-layered security with advanced privacy protection using VPN tunneling.

name: PureVPN
notes: PureVPN is much more than your usual VPN services provider. It offers unparalleled security and anonymity, making it your only choice for a secure online browsing experience.

name: Surfshark
notes: All you need in a VPN and more in one easy-to-use app.

name: Tailscale
notes: Tailscale is a WireGuard-based app that makes secure, private networks easy for teams of any scale.

name: Windscribe
notes: Browse the web privately as it was meant to be.

name: WireGuard
notes: WireGuard is an extremely simple yet fast and modern VPN that utilizes state-of-the-art cryptography. It aims to be faster, simpler, leaner, and more useful than IPsec, while avoiding the massive headache.
